home.title: DinoGenics Solo Helper
home.play1: Play DinoGenics against a DiNO, the Solo Opponent.
home.play2: DiNO can be used for any 1-4 player game including the DinoGenics base game and Controlled Chaos expansion.

modules.title: Modules and Expansions
modules.controlled-chaos-chaos-theory: Controlled Chaos Expansion: Chaos Theory Module
modules.controlled-chaos-dinosaur-elites: Controlled Chaos Expansion: Dinosaur Elites Module

setupBot.title: Setup DiNO
setupBot.prepareGame: Prepare the game as usual for {totalPlayerCount} players.
setupBot.botPlayerPieces: DiNO receives all player pieces of a color, the starting money, 4 fences and a Personal Island Board.
setupBot.botDNACards: DiNO receives 5 DNA cards, 1 Mutant reference card, and 3 Manipulation cards
setupBot.botDNACardsControlledChaos: DiNO receives 4 DNA cards, 1 eDNA card, 1 Mutant reference card, and 3 Manipulation cards.
setupBot.botDNACardArrangement: Place DiNO’s DNA cards face up and all Manipulation Cards face down on stacks next to DiNO’s Island Board as indicated.
setupBot.botTurnOrder: DiNO always starts last in turn order on the first round of the game.

roundOpenSeason.title: Open Season
roundOpenSeason.playerOrder: Determine player order based on reputation

determinePlayerOrder.newItemsSelect: Please determine the new player order.

roundOpenSeason.assignVisitors: Assign visitors based on player order
roundOpenSeason.receiveIncome: Each player receives 1 credit for each visitor in their park
roundOpenSeason.breakingNews: Resolve the next Breaking News card, and draw a new upcoming one
roundOpenSeason.drawFacilityTiles: Draw one random tile to each of the 2nd/3rd/4th facility stacks in the City Center
roundOpenSeason.drawSpecialists: Draw two new specialists to the specialist display spaces.

roundUpkeepPhase.title: Upkeep Phase
roundUpkeepPhase.feedCarnivores: Feed all carnivores (must feed carnivores as much as possible)
roundUpkeepPhase.checkRampage: Check for rampage, and roll if necessary
roundUpkeepPhase.gainVisitorVPs: Gain 3 VPs for every two visitors leaving the park alive
roundUpkeepPhase.gainDinosaurFacilityVPs: Gain Victory Points from dinosaurs and facilities
roundUpkeepPhase.gainDinosaurFacilityResources: Gain resources from dinosaurs and facilities
roundUpkeepPhase.returnWorkers: Return workers from the Mainland board to each owner’s park
roundUpkeepPhase.advanceVisitorOverlay: Advance the Visitor Overlay one column to the left

dnaCollectionArrangement.title: DINO DNA Collection and Arrangement
dnaCollectionArrangement.setCollection: During the game DINO will focus on collecting DNA sets of up to 4 different species. As part of DINO’s setup, create the preferred species’ stacks beside DINO’s Island Board. Unique species will form their own column while duplicates will be stacked as they are drawn.
dnaCollectionArrangement.cardOrder: Start with the first two DNA cards/species (1st & 2nd species) on the right, proceed to the left with the eDNA card/species (3rd species) and a possible 4th species to the left. On the leftmost column, place the Mutant reference card. The Preferred Species 3 column is only specific to eDNA during setup.
dnaCollectionArrangement.noDuplicates: If there were no duplicates the 5th card will be placed below the Mutant reference card to form a stack of spare DNA.

example.title: Example
example.description: DINO received five random cards plus the Mutant reference card during setup. Because DINO received two Ankylosaurus, they are grouped together. The DNA-species are placed in the order of reception from right to left. Place the Mutant reference card in the far left space. The Megalodon is placed on the 3rd spot from the right, because it was drawn from the eDNA deck.

site-a.title: Site A
site-a.shortDescription: Only if less than 2 complete DNA sets.

site-b.title: Site B
site-b.shortDescription: Only if less than 2 complete DNA sets.

boneyard.title: The Boneyard
boneyard.shortDescription: If contains card for one of the 4 preferred species.

farm.title: The Farm
farm.shortDescription: If no/not enough goats for this season and next.

time-share.title: Time Share
time-share.shortDescription: Only if uneven number of visitors.

outsource.title: Outsource
outsource.shortDescription: Draw another card to determine action.

dinogenics-iom.title: DinoGenics IOM
dinogenics-iom.shortDescription: If complete set, suitable habitat and goats.

site-d.title: Site D
site-d.shortDescription: Only if less than 2 complete DNA sets.

refinement.title: Refinement
refinement.shortDescription: If less than 2 refined DNA tokens.

intelligen-designs-hq.title: IntelliGen Designs HQ
intelligen-designs-hq.shortDescription: Draw two more cards to determine slots.

action.abortGameConfirm: Aborting the running game - are you sure?
action.endGameConfirm: End this game and return to home screen - are you sure?

serviceWorkerUpdatedRefresh.title: Refresh Application
serviceWorkerUpdatedRefresh.notice: The application was updated - do you want to refresh to use the latest version?
